meanings.definition: A tanning substance obtained from the pods of certain South American trees of the genus *Prosopis*, especially *P. pallida*.
meanings.english_definition: A tanning substance obtained from the pods of certain South American trees of the genus *Prosopis*, especially *P. pallida*.

etymology.value: Derived from *algarrobo* (Spanish for carob tree, though applied to *Prosopis* trees in South America) with the diminutive suffix *-illa*.
